ing: 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix
1 (1.8 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
des: "I love spinach dip. The crunch of water chestnuts is good but there is just something about them I do not care for. Also, too much spinach I do not like, so I altered a few things from others I have made and found one I just love! It is not too spinach-y. I love the crunch from the jicama and red bell pepper. Took this to a party and it was a hit! I served in round sourdough bread bowl with variety of bread, crackers, and veggies. Enjoy!"
ins: Mix together the mayonnaise, sour cream, leek soup mix, vegetable soup mix, paprika, black pepper, jicama, red bell pepper, green onion, and spinach in a bowl. Chill at least 3 hours or overnight.
